New Records: Rohit Sharma scored 92 runs off 41 balls, breaking the record for the fastest 50 in T20Is (50 off 19 balls)
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma's rampage in the match, scoring 76 of his 92 runs in boundaries
Travis Head's 76 runs, but it was not enough to secure a win for Australia
Pre-Game Insights: No specific pre-match insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma's performance was praised for his commitment to an attacking game at personal cost
India's victory was highlighted as a significant step towards the semi-finals
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won all three of their Super Eight games and will play England in the second semi-final in Guyana
Others: Australia may still make the final four, but they need Bangladesh to do them a favour and beat Afghanistan in their match
